page.title: 06SCHOOLS
page.content: THERE ARE{PRIMARY SCHOOLS}IN BOTH MURSLEY AND DRAYTON PARSLOW CATERING FOR CHILDREN FROM FIVE YEARS TO NINE OR OVER.WHEN THE CHILDREN LEAVE MURSLEY THEY GO TO{RUSHMEAD MIDDLE {SCHOOL}IN WINSLOW.THE PRESENT NUMBER OF PUPILS AT MURSLEY ARE THIRTY TWO AND EIGHTEEN AT DRAYTON PARSLOW.THE {PLAYGROUP}MEETS FOUR DAYS A WEEK AT MURSLEY WITH THIRTEEN CHILDREN NOT JUST FROM MURSLEY.{DRAYTON PARSLOW'S} PLAYGROUP MEET AT THE SCHOOL AND HAS TEN CHILDREN.WHEN THE 1ST SCHOOL CHILDREN LEAVE DRAYTON PARSLOW THEY GO TO EITHER{NEWTON LONGVILLE}OR{STEWKLEY {.}BOTH SCHOOLS HAVE ACTIVE PARENTS' ASSOCIATIONS WHICH RAISE A GREAT DEAL OF MONEY FOR EQUIPMENT.
